children.subject: Please add your last name to your piazza account, and then email me and I'll check. We do not allow anonymous users on here.

I remember I have filled out this form at some point during this semester, but I can't find any confirmation emails. Is there any way for me to check whether I have successfully filled out this declaration form? Just want to be sure that I have filled it out.
That's fine for you, as you took 61B elsewhere.

If I submit my petition to declare CS today and end up not meeting the requirements, is it possible to apply again in August (this is assuming that I take CS 61B in the summer)? Will there be any repercussions?

I can see many emails of staff members trying to help you with this issue, including scheduling you a special advising appointment, so please do not claim that nobody responds; that's not an appropriate way to seek help.

The team has been very busy with the EECS and CS commencements and will get back to you when we can.

history.content:
Applying to the CS Major

Please complete the Major Application Form. 

  • The application deadline is the 15th of the last month of the semester in which you are completing your technical prerequisites: Dec 15, May 15, and Aug 15. 
  • You would be submitting your application before you get your grades.
  • Applications will be processed after grades are OFFICIALLY posted to your transcript 
  • You will be notified of the decision via email (approximately 3-4 weeks after the semester ends).
  • For double or triple majors within the College of Letters & Science: complete the Double Major Application Packet, upload it to the CS major app linked above, a CS advisor will sign your forms after we process the application. You do not need a signature from us before uploading the double-major form.
  • For students double majoring with a major outside of the College of Letters & Science: complete the Simultaneous Degree Application Packetinstead of the Double Major Application Packet
  • For students change majors and/or changing colleges, please review the respective web pages and complete the appropriate forms. 
  • CS advisors will sign the aforementioned forms when your online application is reviewed.

Source
history.subject: Deadline to declare CS Major is today
